description: Frieren`s Party encounter three treasure chests. Fern cautions that at least one of them must be a mimic, so Stark suggests using the magic that brings good luck. The first chest contains gold and treasure, and the second chest contains a rare grimoire. To their dismay, Frieren insists on opening the third chest, which is a mimic. She gets caught and yells that it is dark and scary inside, and Fern wonders if Frieren did this on purpose.

titles.title: Magic Episode 9: Magic to Improve Luck (Part 2)
Marumaru no Mahou Dai 9 Kai: Un ga Yoku Naru Mahou Sono 2
●●の魔法 第9回: 運が良くなる魔法その2
